name: poznote
tagline: A simple self-hosted markdown note taking platform
description: Poznote is a self-hosted personal note-taking platform with Markdown support, folders, tags, and a focus on simplicity and privacy. It uses a lightweight interface for managing text-based knowledge.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write notes in Markdown with live preview and syntax highlighting

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize notes into hierarchical folders for structured knowledge management

features.title: Tag System
features.description: Apply tags to notes for flexible categorization beyond folder structures

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find notes quickly using full-text search across titles and content

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted deployment ensures complete control over your personal notes and data

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal, fast-loading UI designed for distraction-free note-taking

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Export notes in Markdown, HTML, or plain text formats for backup or sharing
